meanings.sent1: Seans is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent2: I met a guy named Seans yesterday.
meanings.sent4: His presence lit up the room like Seans.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the name Seans.

meanings.definition: The act of cutting or trimming with scissors.
meanings.sent1: She carefully performed the seans on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The seans on her hair gave her a new look.
meanings.sent3: The seans on the fabric turned out perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the seans was like an artist's brush.
meanings.sent5: The sound of seans echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to 60 seconds.
meanings.sent1: He finished the race in just a few seans.
meanings.sent2: Wait for a few seans before starting the next task.
meanings.sent3: In a couple of seans, it will be time to go.
meanings.sent4: Time slipped away like seans in the hourglass.
meanings.sent5: The seans ticked by slowly as he waited.
